task_name: choose a phone for my mom
task_description: Task to choose a phone for my mom

must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: A good warranty and customer support service
Long battery life for all-day use without charging
Affordable price with good value for features
Variety of color options for personal style preference
deal_breakers: Screen size is too small for comfortable viewing

technical: Something with a good processor, I think?
A camera that takes nice pictures, but I'm not sure what megapixels means
Maybe something modern but not too flashy?
non_technical: Good performance for daily tasks, whatever that means
I heard battery life is important but I'm not clear on how much is enough

must_meet: It should be easy enough for my mom to figure out, I hope
Must be within budget, but I'm not sure what that means exactly
should_meet: It would be great if it has a decent screen size, whatever that means
I think it should have a good warranty, but I don't know how to check
nice_to_meet: If it looks nice and is cool, that would be a bonus!
Long-lasting battery life sounds great, but I'm unsure how to evaluate that
